story_parts.text: In the beginning, there was a dog. She was a good dog. She loved her family and she loved to play. One day, she saw a squirrel. She chased the squirrel up a tree and she barked at it. The squirrel was scared and it ran away.

next_options.0: The dog's family scolded her for chasing the squirrel and she never did it again
next_options.1: The dog continued to chase squirrels every chance she got
